description: Structured information on the content type of a file instance, bundle or repository.

description._instruction: Enter a description of the content type specification. May be left blank if a public specification can be linked in 'specification'.
description.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
description.title: Description

fileExtension._instruction: Enter one or several file extensions associated with this content type.
fileExtension.description: String of characters attached as suffix to the names of files of a particular format.
fileExtension.title: File extension

name._instruction: Enter the name (iana-inspired convention) of this content type.
name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
name.title: Name

relatedMediaType._instruction: Enter the iternationalized resource identifier (IRI) of the official registered media type (e.g. on IANA.org) matching this content type.
relatedMediaType.description: Reference to an official two-part identifier for file formats and format contents.
relatedMediaType.title: Related media type

specification._instruction: Enter the iternationalized resource identifier (IRI) of the official specification of this content type. Leave blank and use 'description' to provide some specification if an official specification is not available.
specification.description: Detailed and precise presentation of, or proposal for something.
specification.title: Specification

synonym._instruction: Enter one or several synonyms of this content type.
synonym.description: Words or expressions used in the same language that have the same or nearly the same meaning in some or all senses.
synonym.title: Synonym

title: Content type
